plays.text: Penalty to Oleg Tverdovsky 2 minutes for Holding Kris Draper

Goal scored by Samuel Pahlsson assisted by PATRIC KJELLBERG
Penalty to Steve Yzerman 2 minutes for Hooking Keith Carney
Goal scored by Oleg Tverdovsky assisted by Marc Chouinard
Penalty to Pavel Trnka 2 minutes for Hooking Brett Hull
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Tripping Matt Cullen
Goal scored by Marc Chouinard assisted by Denny Lambert and Dan Bylsma
Penalty to Jeff Friesen 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
